CmdLine: echo "# Installing Logstash" ; wget -q https://download.elasticsearch.org/logstash/logstash/logstash-1.4.2.tar.gz -O /tmp/ls.tgz ; tar -xzf /tmp/ls.tgz -C /opt/ ; mv /opt/logstash-1.4.2 /opt/logstash ; mkdir -p /etc/service/logstash ; chown -R app:app /opt/logstash ;  echo "# Cleaning up" ; apt-get clean && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* /tmp/* /var/tmp/* /setup /build
Commands.Name: run
